summary: This will remove the Red Screen effect whenever using the shout Aura Whisper.
descriptionHtml:
This will remove the Red Screen effect whenever using the shout [b]Aura Whisper[/b].

[b]Installation:[/b]
[list]
[*]Download via Nexus Mod Manager
[*]or Drag and drop to your Nexus Mod Manager \'Mods\' tab window
[*]or Copy to [code]Skyrim/Data[/code] Folder
[/list]

[b]Unsintallation:[/b]
[list]
[*]Uninstall using the Nexus Mod Manager
[*]or Locate and delete the [b]\'Aura Whisper - No Red Screen.esp\'[/b] file located at your [code]Skyrim/Data[/code] folder.
[/list]


You can also use this mod with this:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32053/]Aura Whisper - Friends and Foes[/url]
author: galagast
